title: Resources
description: Contextual data that MCP servers can share with the AI model (files, database schemas, etc.)

notes.2: Resources listed but limited usage - tool execution is primary focus

vscode+github-copilot.evidence: Resources explicitly listed as supported: 'MCP servers can give direct access to resources that you can use as context in your chat prompts.'

visual-studio+github-copilot.evidence: GitHub Copilot MCP support applies across IDEs including Visual Studio. Resources supported per docs.

jetbrains+github-copilot.evidence: GitHub Copilot MCP support applies across IDEs. Docs state resources are supported.

xcode+github-copilot.evidence: GitHub Copilot Xcode resources - docs unclear on support level, marked as not supported.

android-studio+github-copilot.evidence: GitHub Copilot MCP support applies across IDEs including Android Studio. Resources supported per docs.

neovim+github-copilot.evidence: GitHub Copilot MCP support not available for Neovim.

emacs+github-copilot.evidence: GitHub Copilot MCP support not available for Emacs.

vscode+cline.evidence: Resources supported: 'Resources provide consistent access to read-only data, akin to file paths or database queries.'

jetbrains+cline.evidence: Cline uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Resources supported per docs.

android-studio+cline.evidence: Cline uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Resources supported per docs.

vscode+continue.evidence: Resources supported: 'Resources map to Context Providers in Continue'

jetbrains+continue.evidence: Continue uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. 'Resources map to Context Providers.'

android-studio+continue.evidence: Continue uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Resources map to Context Providers.

vscode+cody.evidence: Resources supported per PulseMCP: 'MCP features supported: Resources.'

jetbrains+cody.evidence: Cody uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. PulseMCP lists resources as supported.

visual-studio+cody.evidence: Cody uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. PulseMCP lists resources as supported.

android-studio+cody.evidence: Cody uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. PulseMCP lists resources as supported.

vscode+tabnine.evidence: Not explicitly mentioned. Docs describe tools and data sources but don't specifically reference MCP resources capability.

jetbrains+tabnine.evidence: Tabnine uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Resources not explicitly mentioned in docs.

visual-studio+tabnine.evidence: Tabnine uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Resources not explicitly mentioned in docs.

android-studio+tabnine.evidence: Tabnine uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Resources not explicitly mentioned in docs.

neovim+tabnine.evidence: Resources not explicitly mentioned in Tabnine MCP docs.

vscode+codeium.evidence: No MCP support in Codeium VS Code extension. MCP is only available in Windsurf IDE, Codeium's standalone product.

jetbrains+codeium.evidence: No MCP support in Codeium JetBrains extension. MCP is only in Windsurf IDE.

neovim+codeium.evidence: No MCP support in Codeium Neovim plugin. MCP is only in Windsurf IDE.

android-studio+codeium.evidence: No MCP support in Codeium Android Studio extension. MCP is only available in Windsurf IDE.

vscode+amazonq.evidence: Resources mentioned as supported MCP concept - file contents, database records, API responses, documentation, configuration data.

jetbrains+amazonq.evidence: Amazon Q uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Resources mentioned as supported.

visual-studio+amazonq.evidence: Amazon Q uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Resources mentioned as supported.

android-studio+amazonq.evidence: Amazon Q uses same MCP implementation across IDEs. Resources mentioned as supported.

cursor+native.evidence: Resources explicitly listed as supported: 'Structured data sources that can be read and referenced'

zed+native.evidence: Resources not fully supported per community reports: 'Zed does not yet appear to fully support MCP resources.'

zed+claude-code.evidence: Uses Claude Code's MCP implementation. Claude Code supports resources.

zed+codex-cli.evidence: Unknown - Codex CLI MCP documentation does not specify resources support.

jetbrains+native.evidence: Not mentioned in documentation. JetBrains AI Assistant MCP docs only describe tools support.

neovim+codecompanion.evidence: Resources supported: 'MCP resources become available as variables prefixed with #.'

neovim+amp.evidence: Resources support unknown in Amp MCP docs.

neovim+augment.evidence: Resources support unknown in Augment MCP docs.

emacs+gptel.evidence: Resources not mentioned in gptel docs. Focus is on LLM chat.

emacs+ellama.evidence: Ellama does not have MCP support.

claude-desktop+native.evidence: Claude Desktop is Anthropic's native MCP implementation. Resources fully supported.

claude-code+native.evidence: Claude Code supports MCP resources per documentation.

codex-cli+native.evidence: Codex CLI resources support per OpenAI MCP documentation.

gemini-cli+native.evidence: Gemini CLI has partial resources support - tool execution is primary focus.

void+native.evidence: MCP support status unknown - no clear documentation found for Void Editor MCP integration.

pearai+native.evidence: MCP support status unknown - no clear documentation found for PearAI MCP integration.

firebase-studio+native.evidence: MCP support status unknown - Firebase Studio is new Google product, no MCP documentation found.

jules+native.evidence: MCP support status unknown - Jules is Google's async coding agent, no MCP documentation found.

lovable+native.evidence: Lovable MCP resources support unknown - docs focus on connectors, not explicit resources support.

xcode+native.evidence: No MCP support - Xcode has no built-in MCP integration.

android-studio+native.evidence: MCP support status unknown - Android Studio Gemini integration, MCP via third-party plugins.

vscode+amp.evidence: Amp MCP resources support unknown - docs focus on tools.

jetbrains+amp.evidence: Amp MCP resources support unknown - docs focus on tools.

neovim+amp.evidence: Amp MCP resources support unknown - docs focus on tools.

amp+native.evidence: Amp MCP resources support unknown - docs focus on tools.

vscode+augment.evidence: Augment MCP resources support unknown - docs focus on tools.

jetbrains+augment.evidence: Augment MCP resources support unknown - docs focus on tools.

neovim+augment.evidence: Augment MCP resources support unknown - docs focus on tools.

vscode+gemini-code-assist.evidence: MCP support status unknown - Gemini Code Assist MCP documentation not clearly found.

jetbrains+gemini-code-assist.evidence: MCP support status unknown - Gemini Code Assist MCP documentation not clearly found.

android-studio+gemini-code-assist.evidence: MCP support status unknown - Gemini Code Assist MCP documentation not clearly found.
